Release Notes for My Tracks version 1.1.11
  * change code to import tracks
  * in the welcome flow, change code to ask the user if he prefers metric or imperial
  * fix crashes with Ant+ sensor manager
  * remove temp files on the SD card
  * when sharing a track with friend, include the track id
  * fix button layout and order
  * update all strings
  * add option to set the default activity type at Settings->Recording->Default activity type
  * fix "My location" not being centered on the map view
